name: asminegpt-chrome-extension
description: ChatGPT Audit for WooCommerce Chrome Extension

scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:release: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && npm run zip
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch slider.js --watch slider.html --watch styles.css --watch manifest.json --exec 'npm run build:dev'

author: Your Name
